name: Halloween Spooky Seek & Find Hidden Object games
name_original: Halloween Spooky Seek & Find Hidden Object games
description:
Can you escape from this amazing Halloween Hidden Objects adventure puzzle game?

EXPLORE A MYSTERIOUS WORLD BEYOND YOUR IMAGINATION
* Stunning Mysterious Levels
* Find all unique objects

See if you can find them all!
Forget all the point and click adventures and dive right into the mysterious world of Hidden Objects adventure puzzle!
